1.paragraph: At home to gym, crossfit to pilates, yoga to bodyweight, as well as healthy and easy to make breakfasts, lunches, dinners and snacks. We want to make sure you enjoy the journey for a healthy lifestyle.

2.pTitle: A concise title is most effective
2.paragraph: From home workouts to the gym, CrossFit to Pilates, yoga to bodyweight exercises, plus quick and healthy breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack ideas. We're here to help you enjoy every step of your healthy lifestyle journey.

3.paragraph: Whether it's home workouts, gym sessions, CrossFit, Pilates, yoga, or bodyweight exercises, along with simple and nutritious meals for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks, we’re here to make your healthy lifestyle journey enjoyable.

buttons.preferenceText: Tap the options below to save your preferences

0.title: Step 1
0.text: Add the oats, desiccated coconut and nuts into a large mixing bowl (you can experiment with different types of nuts).

1.title: Step 2
1.text: Grate the apples. After, add the grated apples, coconut yoghurt, lemon juice and zest to the mixing bowl with the oats and nuts. Add the cashew milk and stir the museli mix to make sure everything is combined.

2.title: Step 3
2.text: Clingfilm or cover the bowl, leaving it in the fridge to soak overnight.

3.title: Step 4
3.text: You can prepare the berry coulis the same time as muesli and leave them both overnight in the fridge. Heat a medium frying pan or saucepan, and add in frozen or fresh berries (both work equally well here). Cook on a medium heat.

4.title: Step 5
4.text: As the berries start to release their juices, add in the lemon juice, tossing the pan to mix.

tips.title: Chef’s Tips
tips.p: Once you have mastered the perfect porridge base, you can enjoy experimenting with different toppings like chopped nuts, strawberries and berry coulis

0.title: Step 1
0.text: Add the oats, desiccated coconut and nuts into a large mixing bowl (you can experiment with different types of nuts).

1.title: Step 2
1.text: Grate the apples. After, add the grated apples, coconut yoghurt, lemon juice and zest to the mixing bowl with the oats and nuts. Add the cashew milk and stir the museli mix to make sure everything is combined.

2.title: Step 3
2.text: Clingfilm or cover the bowl, leaving it in the fridge to soak overnight.

3.title: Step 4
3.text: You can prepare the berry coulis the same time as muesli and leave them both overnight in the fridge. Heat a medium frying pan or saucepan, and add in frozen or fresh berries (both work equally well here). Cook on a medium heat.

4.title: Step 5
4.text: As the berries start to release their juices, add in the lemon juice, tossing the pan to mix.

tips.title: Trainer Tips
tips.content: Once you have mastered the perfect porridge base, you can enjoy experimenting with different toppings like chopped nuts, strawberries and berry coulis

0.title: Hydration
0.paragraph: Water comprises 60% of the human body and plays a vital role in most of the body’s processes and functions. Even a small amount of dehydration can interfere with these bodily processes, negatively affecting mood, physical and mental performance.

0.title: How do I complete an exercise?
0.paragraph: To complete an exercise, follow the steps outlined in the instructions provided. Make sure to understand the goal of the task, perform the required actions, and submit your results if necessary. You can always review example solutions or hints if you're stuck. Once you've finished, you'll receive feedback or a completion notification.

1.title: Can I modify my existing goal?
1.paragraph: Yes, you can modify your existing goal at any time. Simply navigate to your goals section, select the goal you'd like to change, and click 'Edit'. From there, you can update the target, change the deadline, or adjust any related tasks. Your progress will remain intact unless you choose to reset it.

2.title: How do I track my progress?
2.paragraph: Progress tracking is available in your dashboard. It shows an overview of your completed tasks, current streaks, and milestones. Make sure to log your activities consistently so the system can provide accurate insights and recommendations based on your performance.
